entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: DateTime.ToDateTimeOffset(TimeZoneInfo) #78934
    Future
  • Feature request: Inline Breakpoint support in Visual Studio #78932
  • ILCompiler --make-repro-path option is not working in .net8 #78921
    8.0.0
  • Have `ConstructorInfo` use `Activator.CreateInstance()` instead of emit for default constructors #78917
    8.0.0
  • Unable to add a Certificate in ClientCertificates from HttpClientHandler/SocketsHttpHandler #78933
  • Binary DataContractSerializer serialization is broken in .NET 7 for floating point data types #78913
  • System.Net.Http.Unit.Tests failing under jitstress #78912
    8.0.0
  • `AppDomain.CurrentDomain.ProcessExit` is not called on macOS (maccatalyst) in MAUI app #78911
  • System.Net.NameResolution.Tests.GetHostAddressesTest_Cancellation.DnsGetHostAddresses_PostCancelledToken_Throws failing in CI #78909
  • [wasm] Implement dynamic calling of any JS function #78906
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Make JSObject to implement IDictionary #78905
    8.0.0
  • CS8631 in System.Text.Json source generated code #78903
  • Test failure GC\\Regressions\\Github\\Runtime_76219\\Runtime_76219\\Runtime_76219.cmd #78899
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_63354\\Runtime_63354\\Runtime_63354.cmd #78898
  • Possible heap corruption #78897
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Multiple PRs failing with WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests failure #78892
  • net7.0 app crashes in ProfilerAddNewRegion after profiler attach #78831
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Creating linked cancellation tokens hides which token triggered cancellation #78880
  • Why aren't operators overloaded for Vector and Matrix? #78483
  • [API Proposal]: Idea for a convenient Replace. area-system-runtime #78423
  • Why don't `DateTime` and `TimeSpan` implement the new "numeric" interfaces in C# 11/.NET 7? #78740
  • Binding NpgsqlConnectionStringBuilder to configuration does not work on .net 7.0 #78908
  • StreamReader.ReadLineAsync() blocks on empty stdin in .NET 7 RC 2 #77358
    7.0.x
  • Is there anyway to customize System.Text.Json error message? #78910
  • The BlockingCollection<T> backed by a custom collection doesn't work properly #69816
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 9/23/2022 4:51:48 AM #78804
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 10/23/2022 8:43:59 AM #78811
  • Arm64: If Conversion can bypass overflow checks #78554
    8.0.0
  • CI failure: System.IO.Pipes.Tests.NamedPipeTest_Specific.ClientConnectAsync_Cancel_With_InfiniteTimeout - The operation has timed out. #78777
    8.0.0
  • [Release/3.1] Better way to consume oob corefx packages in coreclr testing. #42595
    Future
  • [release/3.1] Produce a dummy non shipping package every servicing release to run a package testing for allConfig leg #42594
    Future
  • Move test helper linked files into TestUtilities #31172
    Future
  • Enable deps.json generation on test projects that currently disable that feature #29868
    Future
  • ApiCompat does not compare implementations to netstandard when a more specific ref is present #26485
    Future
  • Generic virtual method pointer lookup failure in .NET 7 Native AOT #78882
  • There are some exception when publish a app in .net core 7 #78901

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix non-determinism in Type.IsAssignableTo #78939
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Make sure s_currentGenerationTable is safe for profiler attach #78937
  • [release/7.0] Generate diagnosable failfast in GVM resolution #78936
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Add readmes for @dotnet/area-system-io #78935
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix initblk/cpblk and STORE_DYN_BLK size mismatch #78930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold some HW nodes for constant input #78929
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in the RegexCompiler and source gen #78927
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Disable mark phase prefetching for segments #78925
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix response file parsing and repro package creation #78924
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix nullable annotation on Path.EndsInDirectorySeparator(string) #78922
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use string interpolation in more places #78920
    area-Meta
  • Replace more Unsafe.As usage with pointers #78919
    area-Meta
  • [Android] Fix SslStream on Android API 21-23 #78918
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [wasm] Catch error from loading "node:crypto" module #78916
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] Memory snapshot #78915
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Remove span pinning associated with string.Create #78914
  • Extend regex [x, x+64) char class optimization to [x, x+32) #78900
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • Fix typos: entires -> entries #78928
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Make sure s_currentGenerationTable is safe for profiler attach #78841
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add compiler-generated code tests for NativeAot #77457
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Disable ClientConnectAsync_Cancel_With_InfiniteTimeout test frequently failing in CI #78923
  • Generate diagnosable failfast in GVM resolution #78904
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • add README files for Microsoft.Win32.* #78248
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Correctly handle false on Add/Take from underlying collection in BlockingCollection #77936
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Disable mark phase prefetching for segments #78803
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update JsonSerializer.Write.Stream.cs #78902
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in Cookie DomainCharsTest #78896
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Set GTF_ORDER_SIDEEFF for some nodes with invisible dependencies #78698
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace loop with LastIndexOfAny in DeveloperExperience.cs #78895
    8.0.0
  • Convert pointers in a couple tables to relative #78801
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Align version option in System.CommandLine usages #78886
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Do not set flags for JTRUE op1 #76731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CngKey.KeySize for keys in the Platform Crypto Provider #77809
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Support GT_SELECT on xarch #78879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [6.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78670
    Servicing-approved, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78669
    Servicing-approved, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.2
  • [Release/7.0][PERF]Fix Mono Dotnet Generation #78413
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] This fixes Github issue 78206 - a heap corruption problem associated with mark stack overflow #78855
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [WIP] Alternative fix for GC pal linking (without the size_t related change for MacOS) #78792
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.2
  • [PERF] Make mono dotnet pathing dynamic with proj file #78787
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Tar: Remove invalidation of whitespace in PAX extended attributes #78785
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.2
  • [release/7.0] Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78779
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.2
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Use "node:crypto" to polyfill getRandomValues on older node #78766
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] propagate aborted startup to top most promise #78764
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.2
  • [release/7.0] [mono][wasm] Disable AOTing methods which contain catch clauses insid… #78732
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 7.0.2
  • [release/7.0] Update a few dependencies #78710
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2054903 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add .NET 7 source gen regression tests #78857
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #78532
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.2
  • [Release/6.0][PERF] Fix perf repo branch setup target, tool build, and mono-dotnet create #78411
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • CoreCLR initialization failures logging #78790
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Minor optimizations for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `FIELD_ADDR` for all `ldflda`s #78226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Split library and package Readme #78888
    area-Meta, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Allow some intrinsics in Tier0 (e.g. Enum.HasFlag) #77357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove instances of `%S` #78894
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix commit accounting for large pages #78564
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.2
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Aging dependent handles #78746
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make DAC logging opt-in #77923
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reflection context tests working #77999
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Implement a heuristic for using fast-path serialization in streaming JsonSerializer methods. #78646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix Vector128 divide by scalar #78784
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Fold const RVA access (via const index) #78783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][draft] make JSObject dynamic #78853
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Remove repeated calls to beginHandshake #78849
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [wasm] optimize interop startup and linker hints #77256
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Enable basic Kept validation in NativeAOT running linker tests #78828
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update to the stable 7.0.100 SDK (WIP) #78034
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • ArgOutOfRangeException throw helpers #78222
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Support JsonExtensionData in src-gen fast-path #77880
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix ds-ipc-pal-socket.c Windows build. #77840
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-28
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Allow return merging; implement mismatched returns #2104
  • Unify call lowering and codegen; support inline throw helpers #2103

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to 17/12/21 #2101

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CI test failure: Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.New.IntegrationTests.CommonTemplatesTests.AllCommonItemsCreate #29259
  • Exporting generated docker file with .Net 7 publish command #29251
  • Error using wildcard in launchSettings.json #29252
  • Create 7.0 project using terminal and run the project using https, the url can't opened. #29246

Closed

  • apicompat/tool: log message to explain how to generate suppressions #28083
    7.0.2xx
  • [Package-Validation] Provide confirmation that the package validation has run successfully #19214
    7.0.2xx
  • Test failed in CI: Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.New.IntegrationTests.DotnetNewUpdateTests.DoesNotPrintUpdateInfoOnCreation_WhenLatestVersionIsInstalled #29006
  • DoNotShowDeprecationMessage_WhenNewCommandIsUsed failed in CI #28801
  • CanInstallRemoteNuGetPackage_LatestVariations failed in CI #28802
  • Adjust `CommonTemplatesTests` to net8 changes in templates #29197

PullRequests

Created

  • Add base class for all test classes using WatchableApp. #29258
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Deploy watch to redist #29257
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Watch

Merged

  • add console message for package validation success or failure #28769
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • [gh-23135] use parent path of manifest file path as rootConfigDirectory #24935
  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951
  • Remove tmp from the default includes for tests #29180
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29158
  • [release/7.0.2xx] tab completion to suggest only first from short name synonyms #29235
    Area-dotnet new
  • 'dotnet configure add' command for adding new config to a solution file #29139
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2054215 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected ref safety error reported with `out _` with C#7.2 ref safety rules #65651
    17.5
  • Writes through `UnscopedRef` allows bypassing lifetime rules #65648
    17.5
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` class does not generate default values for parameters of member/constructor/operator. #65638
  • Investigate if IDiagnosticAnalyzerService can cache results, even if asked for a subregion of a file. #65637
  • Constant folding isn't done when interpolated string contains at least one variable #65636
  • Question: Packaging of Roslyn analyzer nuget #65635
  • Nullable flow tracking doesn't work through pointer dereference #65634
  • Peek definition on tuple element goes to the element itself, not the corresponding variable #65632

Closed

  • Unexpected ref safety errors when a discard is used as an `out` argument #56587
    17.5
  • Out argument val escape should not contribute to invocation escape analysis #64783
  • <AnalysisLevel>latest-all</AnalysisLevel> seems to be not effective when switching to .NET7 #65630

PullRequests

Created

  • Bring release/vsmac17.4 up to release/dev17.4 #65650
    Area-IDE
  • Bulk read in all the strings-id pairs in the DB. #65649
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Compress indices before storing in persistence service" #65644
    Area-IDE
  • Bump mac editor and implement CocoaTextBufferVisibilityTracker #65643
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #65642
    Area-Compilers
  • reduce the amount of time that we switch from a background thread to … #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Fix a race between AsyncQueue operations (#65078) #65640
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix generation of parameter symbols with explicit default values #65639
    Area-IDE
  • [release/vsmac17.4] Use ILegacyDocumentOptionsProvider if it is available #65631
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Fix null ref in persistence service #65646
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Merge pull request #65407 from Youssef1313/scoped-ide" #65647
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Out arguments do not contribute val escape #64784
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65645
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65561
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #65595
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65653
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implement a new brokered service for passing project information #65592
    Area-IDE
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • log data for analyzers/codefixes/refactorings #65158
    Area-IDE
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65500
    Area-Compilers
  • Support semantic tokens output in LSIF generator #65548
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Support fine-grained diagnostic tagging. #65547
    Area-IDE
  • Cleanup `SyntaxNormalizerTests` #65516
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Bump mac editor and implement CocoaTextBufferVisibilityTracker #65568
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Improve consistency in our parser code. #65508
    Area-Compilers
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #65606
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix stale inline diagnostics #65571
    Area-IDE
  • Attempt an alternative implementation of AsyncQueue #65080
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Merge pull request #63858 from CyrusNajmabadi/pullDiags" #65538
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • View Call Hierarchy - fix thread block (#65452) #65574
    Area-IDE
  • [PERF] Do not force Compilation.GetDiagnostics for FixAll of syntax-only analyzers #65483
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Tenet-Performance
  • Use ILegacyDocumentOptionsProvider if it is available #65614
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Minor cleanup in OptionStore #65450
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate options to allow pooling of JSON serialization infrastructure #45332
  • Understand allocations discrepancies in Json benchmarks #45330
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #45329
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #45328
  • Extend Quickgrid with Id and Style Properties #45327
  • Quickgrid Virtualize=true using Memory data not displaying entire data #45326
  • JSON Serializer creates null item in collection when using IgnoreCycles #45322
  • Validate the changes: SPA Proxy enhancements #45320
    8.0-preview1
  • Custom WebApplicationFactory doesn't work correctly for overriding Configure Method in ConfigureWebHost #45319
  • SignalR-Client-Cpp should consider using a different json library #45318
  • NavigationLock not working #45316
  • Exception java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke virtual method 'void #45315
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson printing errors more than once. #45311
  • Parameter filters not invoked in Minimal API when using WithOpenApi extension method #45307
  • Relative paths with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Rewrite not working #45306
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Incorrect swagger.json causing application hang in Minimal API when using WithOpenApi extension method with DateTime query parameter #45305
  • Perf regression: caching, connectionclose #45304
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, mapaction, plaintext_actix, plainTextSansFilter #45303

Closed

  • http body writeasync size limit #45154
  • Browser print RenderFragment performance issue #45272
  • Docs - Minimal APIs - Dealing with responses #44258
    7.0.0
  • Enhance Blazor.reconnect to state whether failures are due to circuit not existing so we can auto-reload page #44669
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Enable CodeQL3000 pipelines across our repos #44662
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix, fortunes_ef, plaintext #45295
  • Make QuickGrid more inheritance friendly #45182
  • Document how to automatically refresh the browser when the Blazor Server connection is lost #44715
    8.0-MQ
  • Quarantine SignalRClientWorksWithWebSockets #45262
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Package not found error Blazor hosted wasm app while docker build #45281
  • Blazor: Scrollbar Not Resetting on Page Change on Firefox #45163
  • SignalR-Client-Cpp can end in deadlock after stop is called (typically seen in linux builds) #38078
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #45297
  • Rate limiting middleware not working with app.UseRouting() #45302

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Explicitly de-dupe ReferenceCopyLocalPaths in Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.csproj #45334
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Explicitly de-dupe ReferenceCopyLocalPaths in Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.csproj #45333
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Centralize well known types across analyzers #45314
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • [Blazor][debugging] Support Debug on Chromium #45308
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Explicitly de-dupe ReferenceCopyLocalPaths in Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.csproj #45331
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `912db74` to `e68764c` #45309
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `8c9078b` to `a70f5d3` #45310
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Vectorized HttpCharacters (and used IndexOfAnyValues in other places found) #45300
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate
  • Adding id to manifest.json files #45269
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [Hosting] Add {OriginalFormat} to start & stop log state objects #45253
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Reimplement the default object pool for improved performance #45251
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Code analyzer to detect if route parameters are parsable #45286
    area-infrastructure
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly to MVC Model Binding #45243
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix CookieHeaderParserShared throws exception when last cookie contains invalid character #45014 #45127
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22578.5 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2054700 #44686
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet diagnostics tools unable to work with 6.0.11 runtime #3520

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView not scrolling in Android nor Windows #11711
  • Previously shown RadioButton with VisualState Manager becomes erratic after AppTheme is changed by user #11709
  • FlexLayout inside StackLayout does not adjust height #11708
  • Cannot Tracert In MAUI Android but works fine in WinUI #11706
  • TapGestureRecognizer on label in default ControlStyle not working #11705
  • Using Shapes causes continuous layout recalculation on Android #11704
  • [Spec] Keyboard interactions #11703
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Entry field Enter does not always move to next field #11702
  • VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups - Unique name #11701
  • Visual Studio 2022 Enterprise Version 17.4.1 can't select iOS 16 for Asp.net 7.0 .Net Maui iOS application #11700

Closed

  • Moving BlazorDesktop WinForm by dragging element in BlazorWebView crashes #3395
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [iOS] Vertical CollectionView does not show simple Items #8489
  • [iOS]Grouped CollectionView have extra space on ios and maccatalyst #7620
  • Maui iOS failing to load local resources in using WebView Source #10674
    Backlog
  • MauiIcon ForegroundScale does not work on development machines that use a comma as a decimal seperator #11685
    Backlog
  • Application Display Version With Build Number #11642
  • Unable to change/set App Icon and Splash Screen for IOS #11654
  • Resources/Images subfolder problem. #11661
  • Could not find HandleOpenURL virtual method from MauiUIApplicationDelegate #11681
  • Labels with HTML ignore text styling on IOS but not Android #4230
    Backlog
  • Unable to create MAUI project #11284
  • Application targetting .NET 6 and Windows 10.0.22621.0 cannot be run #11585

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure invisible views don't get rows/columns when generating AndExpand layouts #11712
  • Issues/11641 #11710
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar focus issues #11698
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry

  • Notify StrokeDashPattern changes with StrokeDashArray changes #11694

    area/controls 🎮, community ✨

Merged

  • [iOS] RadioButton a11y #10832
    area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • [iOS] Fix issue loading local files in WebView #10804
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11671
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix MauiIcon ForegroundScale on systems with comma as decimal separator #11690
    community ✨
  • [Tizen] Add handing Label.TextType #11646
    community ✨
  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8 #11693
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • _itemsSource may be null in CarouselViewLoopManager #11000
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Make iOS Label HTML behavior compatible with Forms #11569
    area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add Shell FlyoutBackDrop #11613
    platform/tizen
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add handing Label.TextType #11612
    platform/tizen
  • [Build] Update yaml for net8 #11609

Updated

  • Only add PG if VSM is added #11591
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206

  • [Android] Fix SwipeItemView size issues #10522

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ExecuteInTransaction strategy: test verifySucceeded method when commit failure occurs #29695
  • Nullable object must have a value within Entity Framework Core 6.0 #29691
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException thrown on ExecuteDeleteAsync #29690

Closed

  • JsonColumns vs ExecuteUpdateAsync + custom serializer for JsonColums #29675
  • Support for TBT and TBC in ExecuteUpdate(Async) & ExecuteDelete(Async) #29666
  • Json Column With Id property #29663
  • Could not load file or assembly Microsoft.SqlServer.Server #29658
  • How to map a value object to a row in the database? #29653
  • Memory increase when creating so many Sqlite databases #29596
  • EF Core 7 Problem when Add with entity with Identity and child entities with FK #29586
  • Use FromSqlRaw in Include #29488
  • How to specify an optional SplitToTable configuration #29652

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.2 #29694
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to get latest sdk 7.0.2xx build #15044
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Build failure when source-build builds on itself due to `_GenerateComposites` #15040

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #15046
  • Use dotnet/dotnet instead of the tarball for Source-Build builds #15042
  • removed workarounds for `console` and `classlib` in template tests #15041
  • [release/7.0.1xx] repos/sdk.proj: set NativeAotSupported=false on arm platform #15039

Merged

  • Override some versions for nonshipping runtime packages. #15045
  • Allow specifying a revision to initialize VMR from #15038

Updated

  • Add Alpine CI for source-build #14417
    Area-SourceBuild
